content: the cottage pumpkin tapestry is a cozy farmhouse-inspired wall hanging featuring warm autumn tones and charming 3d leaf appliqués for added texture and whimsy skill level suitable for intermediate crocheters with basic knowledge of stitches and tapestry techniques project size 50 row with 50 stitches per row finished tapestry measures approximately 12 x 10 inches using the suggested materials size may vary based on yarn and hook size used pattern includes o detailed written pattern in standard us crochet terms o complete pattern graphs and color block instructions o reference photos and video tutorials o link to the stitch fiddle graph suggested materials o worsted weight yarn in 5 colors o 5 mm & 4 mm crochet hooks o wooden dowel o tapestry needle copyright this pattern is the sole property of earth hand & fiber and is copyright protected you may not sell or share this pattern in any form distribute it full or partially or reproduce it in any way you are welcome to sell your finished items created from this pattern i ask that you credit or tag earth hand & fiber ig @earth hand fiber or facebook @earthhandandfiber when posting or selling online my photos are copyright protected and are not to be used to sell your items
